op.memo: I believe in Steemit, I believe in You!  Good afternoon, I want to invite you to support my post dedicated to my dream and development and good advertizing of community of Steemit! I want to make the balloon on which I am going to visit many large cities and to place the logo and the slogan Steemit on it.  Support me and I will support you!  URL : https://steemit.com/steem/@vdoh/rise-steemit
